Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.leaders

Class LeadersSpace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.leaders.LeadersSpace
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasStatus, WinPointsCountable
public class LeadersSpace extends Object implements HasStatus, WinPointsCountable
Manages tho operations on the 2 leaders of the player

      SupplyException - Requirements to activate the leader aren't met
